name: No Signal
description:
The game about the plane will allow you to sit at the helm of a metal bird and feel the pleasure of flying. If you are tuned to a serious mood and not afraid of difficulties, then try to cut the air on an agile machine while avoiding obstacles adjusting to their color, and that will be life-saving for you!

Game features:
  • 15 levels with gradually increasing complexity
  • A lot of puzzles. The further, the more enchanting
  • Classic graphics and old school gameplay with one of the most underrated mechanics
